text: Jami at-Tirmizi (), also known as Sunan at-Tirmizi, is one of the Kutub al- Sittah (six major hadith collections). It was collected by At-Tirmidhi.Aridhat al-Ahwathi bi Sharh Sunan al-Tirmidhi written Ibn al-Arabi d. 543H (1148-49 CE) Sunnis regard this collection as fifth in strength of their six major hadith collections. == References == Category:Hadith Category:Hadith Books
title: Sahih al-Tirmidhi
